name: Chronicon
summary: Use the magical device known as the Chronicon to travel into the souls and memories of fallen heroes to re-live their grand tales! Epic adventures full of loot and monsters await!
info:
• 中文名: 像素黑暗史
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020-08-21
  • 官方网站: http://www.subworldgames.com/chronicon/
  • 开发: Subworld
  • 发行: Subworld
